Stone's Armor

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

This maneuver belongs to the Strength of the Mountain combat style.

It costs 10/Resolve Willpower to attempt this maneuver (minimum 1).

A character which activates this power forsakes their forsakes their normal Defense, instead rolling Endurance * Strength of the Mountain. If the character is hit, and their check for this maneuver was successful, damage which would normally be dealt to their personal Hit Points is instead dealt to their Stamina.

Damage dealt to their armor is handled normally.

Category: Specializations
